ComicInfo.Summary:
The habits of the brain-sucking creature called the F___, among themselves and other creatures.
The Aquatic Pooso fellates itself.
The sexual metamorphosis of the male and female happer after they mate.
An anthropomorphic trio, including a talking pig and a talking duck go to Las Vegas in a super optimistic state but don't necessarily leave feeling the same way they came in.
A wordless story featuring the doog and its odd encounters with three other creatures not to mention other doogs.
The appearance and habits of the Mau Guag as well as its adversaries in nature.
